description: Optional. If left unset, a default InvocationConfig will be used.

fullyRefreshIncrementalTablesEnabled.description: Optional. When set to true, any incremental tables will be fully refreshed.

includedTags.description: Optional. The set of tags to include.

includedTargets.description: Optional. The set of action identifiers to include.

items.description: Represents an action identifier. If the action writes output, the output will be written to the referenced database object.

database.description: The action's database (Google Cloud project ID) .

schema.description: The action's schema (BigQuery dataset ID), within `database`.

transitiveDependenciesIncluded.description: Optional. When set to true, transitive dependencies of included actions will be executed.

transitiveDependentsIncluded.description: Optional. When set to true, transitive dependents of included actions will be executed.
